scripts.deploy: npm run build -ws --if-present && npm run synth -w cdk && npm run deploy -w cdk
scripts.deploy:frontend: npm run build -w frontend -w cdk && npm run synth:frontend -w cdk && npm run deploy:frontend -w cdk
scripts.deploy:backend: npm run build -w cdk && npm run synth:backend -w cdk && npm run deploy:backend -w cdk
